name: pods-blitz
description: Pods-Blitz is a self-hosted podcatcher that supports RSS feed parsing, episode downloads, and media playback management. It includes a simple web UI for listening and browsing.

features.title: Rss Feed Parsing
features.description: Subscribe to podcast feeds and automatically fetch new episodes

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Download podcast episodes for offline listening and archival

features.title: Subscription Management
features.description: Organize and manage podcast subscriptions in one place

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find podcasts and episodes by title, description, or keywords

features.title: Episode Filtering
features.description: Filter episodes by date, duration, or played status
